channel.title: Certifications on gavinmassey.net
channel.description: Recent content in Certifications on gavinmassey.net

item.title: VTCA-DCV Certification Study Guide
item.description: Introduction to the Study Guide Welcome to this streamlined version of the study guide for the VMware Certified Technical Associate (VCTA) Exam 1V0-21.20. This guide is based on the comprehensive work of Valerio Passeri in his unofficial study guide. Leveraging the capabilities of generative AI, I have succinctly summarized each key section to provide a focused and efficient review. Please note that while I have strived for accuracy, this material does not carry any official endorsement or guarantee of accuracy.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 1 - Introduction
item.description: Welcome to the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C02) Study Guide series! If you’re preparing for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam, you’ve come to the right place. This comprehensive series is designed to help you systematically cover all the essential topics from the official AWS Cloud Practitioner exam guide. About This Study Guide In this series, I’ve broken down the AWS CLF-C02 exam guide into six parts, each focusing on a specific domain or topic.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 2 - "Knowledge of" Sections
item.description: Article Series Index Part 1 - Introduction Part 2 - “Knowledge of” Sections Part 3 - “Skill in” Sections Part 4 - Technologies and Concepts Part 5 - In Scope Services Part 6 - Summary The following compilation includes content exclusively from the ‘Knowledge of’ sections of the AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide. These sections have been systematically divided and organized into separate articles for your convenience. For comprehensive information, please refer to the corresponding sections in the other parts of this guide.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 6 - Summary
item.description: Article Series Index Part 1 - Introduction Part 2 - “Knowledge of” Sections Part 3 - “Skill in” Sections Part 4 - Technologies and Concepts Part 5 - In Scope Services Part 6 - Summary Cloud Concepts Cost-effective and scalable with a pay-as-you-go pricing model. Global infrastructure offering high availability and speed of deployment. Focus on high availability, elasticity, and agility. Operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, cost optimization, and sustainability are pillars of the AWS Well-Architected Framework.
